post.description: Start pipeline execution with raw input, returns jobId that can be used as a reference for the pipeline to do actions such as results/status/stop, etc.

requestBody.description: an object representing all information needed for pipeline execution

post.description: Start pipeline execution when the name of the pipeline is known, all parameters in this action will be merged with the stored pipeline and then returns jobId that can be used as a reference for the pipeline to do actions such as results/status/stop, etc.

requestBody.description: an object representing all information needed for stored pipeline execution

get.description: Returns the current running pipelines data
Returns a status for the current pipeline.
returns result for the execution of a specific pipeline run. if called before result is determined - returns error.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Unique identifier representing workflow execution - is given in response to calling pipeline run method .

return cron status by given pipeline name
return cron list of all stored pipeline
